alert.note: Alert for Allamakee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 8:53PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Allamakee and northwestern Crawford Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 853 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Waukon, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts of 25 to 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lansing around 915 PM CDT. Harpers Ferry around 925 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Hanover, County Roads A 52 And X 52, Highway 35 And County D, County Roads A 26 And X 6 A, State Road 9 And County X 20, Elon, Rush Creek, Red Barn Campground, Churchtown and Dalby. People attending Lansing Fish Days should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Iowa...and southwestern Wisconsin.
